channel.title: I cant get people to connect anymore
channel.description:
I know a lot of you are going to say "Portforward" maybe that will do the trick maybe not.
I need to say first that I was running my server, about 15-25 people online and then This guy comes on and it starts buggy out and shit, then he gets banned and it stops. About 25 minutes later my computer freezes then No one is able to connect to my rsps anymore. I cant even connect. I go to a server status website and it says my server is offline even whenIm running it.
Someone please help me! I will do anything
My MSN is: Lucasthemod@gmail.com
Please help me! I need my server back online people are starting t quit!

item.title: I cant get people to connect anymore
item.dc:creator: @Nexus1 Nexus_
item.description:
@Nexus1 wrote:

  1. check your firewall, and scan your computer. It’s possible he reverse engineered your client IP and sniffed out your localhost, then put a remote interruption protocol.

once you scan it, try redrafting your computer. Run your server then.

post back if it helps/doesn’t work.

Read full topic
item.source: I cant get people to connect anymore

Sorry sorry… Is it webclient?
